SA11sanss04u:12: yaḥ kulaputra mūrddhâbhiṣiktaṃ staupikaṃ vastv apaharati
SA11sanss04u:13: sāṃghikaṃ vā cāturdiśasāṃghikaṃ vā niryātitaṃ vā /
SA11sanss04u:16: yaḥ punar dharmaṃ pratikṣipati śrāvakaniryāṇabhāṣitaṃ vā
SA11sanss04u:18: mahāyānaniryāṇabhāṣitaṃ vā pratikṣipati pratiṣedhayatîyaṃ dvitīyā mūlâpattiḥ //
SA11sanss04u:23: śīlavato vā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy apaharati apaharāyati /
SA11sanss04u:24: gṛhasthaṃ vā karoti kāye daṇḍaiḥ praharati cārake vā prakṣipati
SA11sanss04u:26: yaḥ punaḥ kṣatriyaḥ saṃcintya mātaraṃ jīvitād vyaparopayati
SA11sanss04u:27: pitaram arhantaṃ bhagavacchrāvakaṃ vā jīvitād vyaparopayati
SA11sanss04u:30: ebhiḥ pañcabhir ānantaryair karmabhir anyatarânyataraṃ karmôtpādayatîyaṃ caturthī mūlâpattiḥ //
SA11sanss04u:32: daśâkuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartate 'nyāṃś ca bahūn
SA11sanss04u:33: satvān daśasv akuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayati vinayati
SA11sanss04u:36: yaḥ punar grāmabhedaṃ janapadabhedaṃ nagarabhedaṃ rāṣṭrabhedaṃ karotîyaṃ mūlâpattiḥ //
SA11sanss04u:41: yābhir mūlâpattibhiḥ skhalitâdikarmikā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ sarvāṇi pūrvâvaropitāni kuśalamūlāni
SA11sanss04u:43: vastupatitāḥ parājitā devamanuṣyamahāyānamukhād apāyagāmino bhavanti ciraṃ ca saṃsāre sīdanti
SA11sanss04u:46: ye satvāḥ pūrvaduścaritahetunâsmin kliṣṭe pañcakaṣāye loke
SA11sanss04u:47: upapannās tae itvarakuśalamūlāḥ kalyāṇamitraṃ saṃniḥśrityêdaṃ paramaṃ gambhīraṃ mahāyānaṃ śṛṇvanti /
SA11sanss04u:50: teṣāṃ ādikarmikā ye ca bodhisatvêdaṃ paramagambhīraṃ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktaṃ sūtrântaṃ śṛṇvanti uddiśanti paṭhanti /
SA11sanss04u:51: te yathāśrutaṃ yathāparyavāptaṃ pareṣāṃ pūrvabuddhisadṛśānāṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ vistareṇâgrataḥ smārayanti prakāśayanti /
SA11sanss04u:52: te hy akṛtaśamā bālāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ śṛṇvantôttrasyanti
SA11sanss04u:58: yayā mūlâpattyā sa kulaputraḥ sarvaṃ pūrvâvaropitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ jhāṣayati /
SA11sanss04u:61: tasmād bodhisatvena mahāsatvena parapudgalānām āśayânuśayaṃ prathamaṃ jñātvā yathâśayānāṃ satvānām anupūrveṇa
SA11sanss04u:65: punar aparam ādikarmiko bodhisatvaḥ kasyacid eva
SA11sanss04u:68: na tvaṃ śakyasi ṣaṭpāramitāsu caryāṃ cartuṃ /
SA11sanss04u:69: na tvaṃ śakyasy anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ /
SA11sanss04u:70: śīghraṃ tvaṃ śrāvakayāne pratyekabuddhayāne vā cittam
SA11sanss04u:73: yāvad yathāpūrvôktam iyam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya dvit-yā
SA11sanss04u:75: punar aparam ādikarmiko bodhisatvaḥ kasyacid evaṃ vakṣyati /
SA11sanss04u:77: śīlena surakṣitena śīghraṃ tvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
SA11sanss04u:80: yat te kiñcit kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ kleśapratyayād akuśalaṃ karma
SA11sanss04u:81: samudānītaṃ tena pāṭhena śuddhir bhavaty avipākaṃ /
SA11sanss04u:82: yāvad yathāpūrvôktam ayam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya tṛtīyā
SA11sanss04u:84: punar aparaṃ kulaputra keṣāñcid ādikarmiko bodhisatvâivaṃ vakṣyati /
SA11sanss04u:86: mā śṛṇuta mā paṭhata mā pareṣām upadiśata /
SA11sanss04u:88: na yūyaṃ tasmāt mahat phalaṃ prāpsyatha /
SA11sanss04u:89: na yūyaṃ tato nidānāc chaktāḥ kleśântaṃ kartuṃ /
SA11sanss04u:91: śṛṇuta mahāyānaṃ paṭhata mahāyānaṃ pareṣāṃ côpadiśata /
SA11sanss04u:94: yadi te tasya vacanakāriṇo bhavantîdṛśaṃ dṛṣṭigatam
SA11sanss04u:96: ubhayor api mūlâpatir bhavatîyam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya
SA11sanss04u:98: punar aparam ādikarmikā bodhisatvā dvijihvikā bhavanti anyathā
SA11sanss04u:100: idaṃ ca mahāyānaṃ kīrtiśabdaślokârthaṃ lŌübhasatkŌürahetoḥ paṭhanti svâdhyŌüyanti dhŌürayanti vŌücayanti
SA11sanss04u:107: te pareṣām īrṣyāyanti lābhasatkārahetor yatas te labhante
SA11sanss04u:108: upabhogaparibhogān parebhyas tatpratyayāt te prakupyanti teṣāṃ câvarṇaṃ niścārayanti kutsanti paṃsayanti vijugupsanti /
SA11sanss04u:110: atas te īrṣyahetunā côttarimanuṣyadharmair ātmānaṃ vijñapayanti /
SA11sanss04u:111: tatas te tena vastunā patitāḥ parājitā mahāyānasukhād etāṃ mahāgurukām āpattim āpadyante yayâpāyagāmino bhavanti /
SA11sanss04u:112: yathā kaścit puruṣo ratnadvīpaṃ gacched gantuṃ nāvā samudram
SA11sanss04u:113: avatarate sa mahāsamudre svayam eva tāṃ nāvaṃ bhindyāt tatrâiva
SA11sanss04u:115: evam eva ye ādikarmikā bodhisatvā mahāguṇasāgaram
SA11sanss04u:117: tatpratyayāt te śraddhānāvaṃ bhittvā prajñājīvitena viyogaṃ prāpnuvanti /
SA11sanss04u:118: evaṃ te bālâdikarmikā bodhisatvêrṣyāhetor anṛtapratyayā mahāgurukām āpattim āpadyante /
SA11sanss04u:122: śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktāḥ sūtrântâdhāraṇīkṣāntisamādhibhūmisvalaṃkṛtamahāvidvatpuruṣāṇāṃ kṛtaśramāṇāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ gocarās tān mahāyānasūtrântān dhārayanti
SA11sanss04u:123: paṭhanti svâdhyāyanti pareṣāṃ ca vistareṇa vācayitvā
SA11sanss04u:125: ahaṃ cêmān dharmān svabuddhyā buddhvâivaṃ ca punar ahaṃ kāruṇyahetos tavôpadiśāmi /
SA11sanss04u:126: tvayā vā punas tathā bhāvayitavyaṃ yathā tvam atra gambhīreṣu
SA11sanss04u:130: evaṃ te jñānadarśanaṃ bhaviṣyati yathā mama /
SA11sanss04u:131: etarhi na punar eva dadāti paṭhitamātreṇâham imān evaṃrūpān
SA11sanss04u:134: tatpratyayāt sarvatryadhvagatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhisatvānām āryapudgalānāṃ ca purataḥ sâparādhiko bhavati /
SA11sanss04u:142: tad yathā kaścit puruṣo mahâṭavīṃ prasthitaḥ
SA11sanss04u:144: āhārârthaṃ sôdāraphalavṛkṣam apahāya gandhasaṃpannaṃ rasasaṃpannam anāsvādya viṣavṛkṣam abhiruhya viṣaphalāni
SA11sanss04u:147: ye durlabhaṃ manuṣyalābhaṃ labdhvā kalyāṇamitraṃ sanniśritya
SA11sanss04u:149: upadarśayanti parān paṃsayanti evaṃrūpāṃ mahāgurukām āpattim
SA11sanss04u:150: āpadyante yayā gurukayâpattyā sarvavijñānāṃ paramajugupsitā bhavanti /
SA11sanss04u:151: apāyagāminas tathārūpāś ca pudgalā na sevanīyāḥ
SA11sanss04u:153: yaś ca tān sevate sa sâtisāro bhavati sarvavijñānāṃ /
SA11sanss04u:156: kṣatriyāṇāṃ purohitacaṇḍālâmātyacaṇḍālā bhaṭacaṇḍālā mūrkhāḥ paṇḍitamānino mahādhanā mahābhogāḥ /
SA11sanss04u:164: tenôpadraveṇa te bhikṣavaḥ paudgalikaṃ vā sāṃghikaṃ vā
SA11sanss04u:165: cāturdiśasāṃghikaṃ vā staupikaṃ vā śramaṇair apahṛtya
SA11sanss04u:181: tena ca hetunā bhikṣūṇām apy upaśāntāḥ kleśā nôpaśamyanti
SA11sanss04u:183: tatkāle punas te bhikṣavâśayavipannā bhavanti śīlavipannāś ca bhavanti /
SA11sanss04u:190: te bhūyasyā mātrayā saparicārasya kṣatriyasya satkṛtā bhavanti
SA11sanss04u:192: te ca prahāṇâbhiyuktānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ gṛhastheṣv avarṇaṃ niścārayanti /
SA11sanss04u:193: sa ca kṣatriyaḥ saparivāraḥ prahāṇâbhiyuktānāṃ bhikṣūṇām
SA11sanss04u:196: yas tatra prahāṇikānāṃ bhikṣūṇām upabhogaparibhogas taṃ svâdhyāyâbhiratānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ niryātayanti /
SA11sanss04u:208: yadi te bodhisatvâkāśagarbhasya bodhisatvasya nāma śrutvā
SA11sanss04u:211: yadi te ākāśagarbhaṃ bodhisatvaṃ namaskuryuḥ nāma câsya
SA11sanss04u:212: parikīrttayeyus teṣāṃ sa kulaputro yathā bhāgyatayā svarūpeṇâgratas tiṣṭhati brāhmaṇarūpeṇa yāvad dārikārūpeṇa purataḥ
SA11sanss04u:222: yadi teṣāṃ saṃmukhaṃ darśanaṃ na dadāti /
SA11sanss04u:224: tenâdikarmikeṇa bodhisatvena sâparādhena paścime yāme utthāyâsanāt prāṅmukhena sthitvā dhūpaṃ dhūpayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss04u:227: aruṇâruṇa mahākṛpa mahābhāga mahôditas tvaṃ jambudvīpe
SA11sanss04u:229: śīghram ākāśagarbhaṃ mahākāruṇikaṃ mama vacanena bodhaya /
SA11sanss04u:231: mama svapnântare tam upāyam upadarśaya yenâham upāyenâpattiṃ pratideśayāmi /
SA11sanss04u:233: tena tatkālaṃ śayyāyāṃ nidrāpayitavyaṃ sahôdgate 'ruṇe iha
SA11sanss04u:236: tasyâdikarmikasya bodhisatvasya svapnântare purataḥ sthitvā tāṃ mūlâpattiṃ deśayati mahāyānôpāyena /
SA11sanss04u:240: sudṛḍhavyavasthitaś ca bhavati mahāyānae ity ādi //
SA11sanss04u:241: atha vā yo 'tra sūtre 'dhyeṣaṇamantraḥ pūrvam uktaḥ /
SA11sanss04u:244: araṇye upavane 'bhyavakāśe vāgaraṃ vā tagaraṃ vā kālânusāri
SA11sanss04u:246: prāñjalinā ca bhūtvā samantato digvidikṣu ca pañcamaṇḍalakena
SA11sanss04u:256: murara vegadhāri namucame bhujayata kāruṇika cintāmaṇi pūraya kāruṇika
SA11sanss04u:268: yadi kṣatriyâdayo 'pi bodhisatvāḥ katham eṣām āpattiniyamo 'nyeṣāṃ câdhikyaṃ /
SA11sanss04u:275: ṣāṃ yatra bahulaṃ saṃbhavaḥ te tatrâkoṭitāḥ
SA11sanss04u:278: yena vā prakṛtimahāsâvadyatayâsamādāno 'py abhavyo bhavaty ucchinnakuśalamūlaś ca sutarāṃ tena sāmvarikêty alam
SA11sanss04u:281: kiṃ vâpi kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ prātimokṣaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ kalpaśatasahasram api mūlaphalabhakṣaḥ syāt /
SA11sanss04u:283: śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktaiś ca manasikārair vihared iyaṃ bodhisatvasya gurukā mūlâpattiḥ /
SA11sanss04u:284: tad yathā kulaputra śrāvakayānīyo mūlâpattim āpannaḥ so 'bhavyas tair eva skandhaiḥ parinirvātum /
SA11sanss04u:285: evam eva kulaputro 'pratideśyâitām āpattim aniḥsṛjya tān
SA11sanss04u:306: daṇḍāpayed vā śramaṇān dadyād vā śaraṇatrayāt //
SA11sanss04u:307: gṛhṇīyād dīyamānaṃ vā śamathe tyājanāt punaḥ /
SA11sanss04u:317: yo mahābrahman mamôddiśya pravrajito duḥśīlapāpasamācāro bhikṣu-
SA11sanss04u:322: atha ca punaḥ sa duḥśīlapāpasamācāro bhikṣur adyâpi
SA11sanss04u:323: sarvadevānāṃ yāvat sarvamanuṣyāṇāṃ yāvat puṇyanidhīnāṃ darśayitā bhavati kalyāṇamitraṃ /
SA11sanss04u:324: kiṃ câpi sâpātrībhūtaḥ tena ca punaḥ śirastuṇḍamuṇḍena
SA11sanss04u:328: tasmād yo mamôddiśya pravrajitaḥ śīlavān duḥśīlo vā tasya
SA11sanss04u:329: nânujānāmi cakravarttir ājñām api yan mamôddiśya
SA11sanss04u:330: pravrajitasya sahadharmeṇâpi kāye daṇḍaprahāraṃ vā dātuṃ cārake vā prakṣeptuṃ /
SA11sanss04u:331: aṅgam aṅgaṃ vikarttanaṃ vā kartuṃ jīvitād vā vyaparopaṇaṃ kartuṃ-
SA11sanss04u:336: atha ca punaḥ sa pudgalo gorocanakastūrikāsadṛśêti /
SA11sanss04u:338: ye mamôddiśya pravrajitān yānabhūtān pātrabhūtān vā
SA11sanss04u:339: viheṭhayiṣyanti te sarveṣāṃ tryadhvagatānāṃ buddhānām atīva
SA11sanss04u:346: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bahūni śrāvakaniyutaśatasahasrāṇi bahūni
SA11sanss04u:347: ca bodhisatvaniyutaśatasahasrāṇi bhagavato 'ntike evaṃrūpaṃ pūrvakṛtaṃ karmâvaraṇaṃ pratideśayanti /
SA11sanss04u:348_0: vayam api bhadanta bhagavan bahūnāṃ pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānāṃ pravacane pātrabhūtān
SA11sanss04u:348_1: pātrabhūtāṃś ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakayānīyān pudgalāñ jugupsitavantaḥ paṃsitavanto
SA11sanss04u:349: tena vayaṃ karmâvaraṇena triṣv apāyeṣu vividhāṃ tīvrāṃ pracaṇḍāṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ pratyanubhūtavantaḥ //
SA11sanss04u:354: vayaṃ bhagavataḥ śrāvakān vacanais tarjitavantaḥ paribhāṣitavantaḥ /
SA11sanss04u:356: vayaṃ bhagavataḥ śrāvakān apātrabhūtān patrâbhūtāṃś ca
SA11sanss04u:363: vayaṃ bhagavantam uddiśya pravrajitān gṛhasthān kāritavantaḥ
SA11sanss04u:368: pātrabhūtāś ca sâparādhikāś cārake prakṣiptās tena vayaṃ karmâvaraṇena bahūn kalpāṃs tṛṣv apāyeṣu vividhāṃ tī-
SA11sanss04u:378: caturbhir mahānāman dharmaiḥ samanvāgato gṛhī akṣaṇaprāpto bhavati /
SA11sanss04u:379: jātyandhaś ca jaḍaś câjihvakaś ca caṇḍālaś ca jātu
SA11sanss04u:380: sukhito bhavaty abhyākhyānabahulaś ca ṣaṇḍakaś ca paṇḍakaś ca
SA11sanss04u:382: strī ca bhavati śvā ca śūkaraś ca gardabhaś côṣṭraś ca
SA11sanss04u:383: āśīviṣaś ca bhavati tatra tatra jātau //
SA11sanss04u:385: iha mahānāman gṛhī pūrvajinakrṭâdhikārāṇāṃ satvānāṃ naiṣkramyacittasya pravrajyācittasyâryamārgacittasyântarāyaṃ karoti /
SA11sanss04u:387: punar aparaṃ gṛhī dhanalaulyena putralaulyena karmavipākam
SA11sanss04u:388: aśraddadhat putrasya vā duhitur vā bhāryāyā vā jñātisaṃghasyâiśvaryasthāne vartamāne pravrajyântarāyaṃ karoti /
SA11sanss04u:401: kapālântaracarā nāma pakṣiṇo ye mastakaṃ bhittvā
SA11sanss04u:403: jihvâmiṣabhujo nāma pakṣiṇo ye jihvāṃ vidāryâbhito 'bhitaḥ prabhakṣayanti /
SA11sanss04u:404: sâpi jihvā bhuktā punar api saṃjāyate padmadalakomalatarā /
SA11sanss04u:414: marmaguhyakā nāma pakṣiṇo ye sarvāṇi marmavivarāṇi bhittvā
SA11sanss04u:415: marmāṇi kṛntayitvā vivarāṇi praviśya majjāmaṇḍaṃ pibanti
SA11sanss04u:417: sūcīchidrā nāma pakṣiṇo ye sūcīsadṛśatuṇḍā raktaṃ pibanti /
SA11sanss04u:420: keśôṇḍukā nāma pakṣiṇo ye keśamūlāny utpāṭayanti //
SA11sanss04u:423: tatra tair anyair nārakeyaiḥ sahânekāni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi
SA11sanss04u:425: sa kathañcid api tasmān muktaḥ sarvasmād duṣkhajālaparivṛtaḥ /
SA11sanss04u:426: śvabhraprapāto nāma dvitīyaḥ pradeśas tatra gacchati /
SA11sanss04u:427: trāṇânveṣī śaraṇânveṣī paritrāṇânveṣī samantatâikādaśabhir arciskandhair āvṛto niḥsahāyaḥ
SA11sanss04u:430: abhiprapannas taṃ śvabhraprapātaṃ nāma pradeśam anudhāvati /
SA11sanss04u:435: sukumārataraḥ ślakṣṇataraḥ kharābhis tīvrābhir vedanābhir abhibhūtaḥ /
SA11sanss04u:436: tasyâivaṃ bhayaviklavavadanasya karacaraṇasarvâṅgapratyaṅgapravilīyamānasya sa pradeśaḥ śvabhraprapāto nāma prādurbhavati /
SA11sanss04u:437: sa tasmin deśe nipatati patitaḥ śvabhre prapatati trīṇi
SA11sanss04u:441: yāvat tasyâivam utkṣipyamānasya ca prapatataś cânekāni
SA11sanss04u:443: kathañcid api tasmān muktaḥ paribhrāmitaś cakrâṅkaṃ vivaraṃ nāma pradeśam anudhāvati /
SA11sanss04u:444: tasmiṃś ca pradeśe sahasrârāṇi cakrāṇi prādurbhavanti
SA11sanss04u:445: vajranābhīni tīkṣṇajvālāni śīghrabhramāṇi tasya sahagamanād eva tā-
SA11sanss04u:449: pratyekaṃ sarvâṅgāni pramathnanto dahanti pādatale câsya
SA11sanss04u:454: bhukto bhuktaḥ punar api saṃjāyate sukumārataraḥ /
SA11sanss04u:459: sâiṣa duṣkṛtakarmântacārī ālātacakranirmāṇagandharvanagaramṛgatṛṣṇikāsadṛśaṃ mahad arthajātaṃ paśyati ratnavastradhanadhānyanikarabhūtaṃ /
SA11sanss04u:469: na câsyânādikālapravṛttaḥ sa lobhas tām apy avasthāṃ gatasya parihīyatae iti //
SA11sanss04u:471: eṣa sa pāpakartā tasmāc chastrasaṅkaṭān muktaḥ kathamapy aṅgārakarṣūr laṅghayitvā karmaṇā bhrāmitaḥ pradeśam anyaṃ prapadyate /
SA11sanss04u:472: vitathadarśanaṃ nāma tatra karmakṛtāṃ striyaṃ paśyati yā tena
SA11sanss04u:475: sa tena dhāvati yena tā striyaḥ /
SA11sanss04u:478: gṛhītvā câuṣṭhāt prabhṛti tathā bhujyate yathâsya
SA11sanss04u:483: sa kaṭukāṃ kharāṃ vedanām anubhavaṃs tasmād rāgâgner na
SA11sanss04u:485: yena tā striyas tena bhūyaḥ saḥ saṃdhāvati /
SA11sanss04u:489: atha tā striyo bhūyo vajramayâyomayaprajvalitagātrās taṃ manuṣyam ādāya jvālāmālâkulasarvaśarīrās taṃ nārakeyaṃ siktāmuṣṭivad bhindanti /
SA11sanss04u:493: strīvidheyā narā ye tu kutas teṣāṃ bhavet sukham //
SA11sanss04u:496: strī vināśo vināśānām iha loke paratra ca /
SA11sanss04u:497: tasmāt striyo vivarjyāḥ syur yadîcchet sukham ātmanêti //
SA11sanss04u:499: sa tair yamapuruṣair gṛhyate gṛhītvā ca tanmukhaṃ vidārayanti
SA11sanss04u:501: sā ca jihvā karmavaśāt pañcayojanaśatapramāṇā bhavati /
SA11sanss04u:506: karmakṛtaṃ ca halasahasraṃ prādurbhavati pradīptâgrasaṃyuktaṃ balavadbhir balīvardais tad asyântargataṃ jihvāyāṃ vahati /
SA11sanss04u:509: sā ca jihvā tathā sukumārā yathā devānām akṣi //
SA11sanss04u:510: yāvat sa vedanātas tanati krandati vikrośati na câsya tadduḥkhaṃ kaścid apanayatîti vistaraḥ /
SA11sanss04u:513: sā kathañcit tasya nārakasya mukhe praviśati /
SA11sanss04u:514: sa bhayavihvalavadano yena vā tena vā niḥpalāyate 'ṅgārakarṣūṣu
SA11sanss04u:520: te taṃ puruṣaṃ mastakāt prabhṛti yāvat pādau cūrṇayantîty ādi //
SA11sanss04u:521: paiśunyavipākas tu yathâiva mṛṣāvādasya trīṇi yojanaśatāni
SA11sanss04u:523: tāṃ yamapuruṣā nistriṃśān ādāya pradīptadhārān jihvāṃ nikṛntanti /
SA11sanss04u:525: paramakaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ prativedayate sa krandati vikrośaty avyaktâkṣaraṃ jihvāvirahitêty ādi //
SA11sanss04u:527: te tāṃ jihvām āsyaṃ vidārya gṛhṇanti /
SA11sanss04u:528: gṛhītvā niśitadhāraiḥ śastraiś chittvā tasya bhūyâiva
SA11sanss04u:532: sā ca jihvā chinnā punar api saṃjāyate karmavaśāt /
SA11sanss04u:539: jihvādhanor vinirmuktas tīkṣṇo vāg viśikhas tvayā /
SA11sanss04u:540: pāruṣyam iti yad dṛṣṭaṃ tasyâitat phalam āgatam //
SA11sanss04u:543: tasya tat prajvalitaṃ tāmradravalohitaṃ jihvāṃ dahati /
SA11sanss04u:545: kaṇṭhaṃ dagdhvā hṛdayaṃ dahati hṛdayaṃ dagdhvântrāṇi dahati /
SA11sanss04u:551: abaddhaṃ yat tvayā proktaṃ tasyâitat phalam āgataṃ //
SA11sanss04u:552: yā na [[DOUBT]] satyavatī nityaṃ na câdhyayanatatparā /
SA11sanss04u:553: na sā jihvā budhair dṛṣṭā kevalaṃ māṃsakhaṇḍikā /
SA11sanss04u:556: atha paśyati riktaṃ tuccham asārakaṃ karmakṛtaṃ bahudraviṇaṃ paraparigṛhītaṃ tasya karmacoditavyāmohitasyâivaṃ bhavati /
SA11sanss04u:558: tataḥ sa nārakas tenâiva dhāvati yena tad dravyaṃ /
SA11sanss04u:559: tasyâbhidhyâkhyamānasasyâkuśalasyâsevitabhāvitabahulīkṛtasya tatphalaṃ yad asau narake viparītaṃ paśyati /
SA11sanss04u:560: tasyâivaṃ paśyato 'bhidhyābahulasya haste śastraṃ prādurbhavati sa tena dhāvati /
SA11sanss04u:561: teṣām apy anyeṣāṃ nārakāṇāṃ haste śastrāṇi prādurbhavanti /
SA11sanss04u:562: sa taiḥ saha śastreṇa yudhyate yāvat tathā kartyate yathā
SA11sanss04u:563: sarṣapaphalamātram api na bhavati māṃsam asya śarīre tathâsthikaṅkālâvaśeṣaḥ kriyate //
SA11sanss04u:571: etebhyo bhayabhīto yena vā tena vā niḥpalāyate /
SA11sanss04u:572: sa kathaṃ śaknoti palāyitum aśubhasya karmaṇaḥ /
SA11sanss04u:574: gṛhītvā ca pūrvaṃ tāvan mastakād bhujyate yāvat pārśvataḥ
SA11sanss04u:577: pādāv api vahninā dāhyete sa yamapuruṣair dūrād iṣubhir vidhyatae iti vistaraḥ //
SA11sanss04u:588: yenâśramaṇena śramaṇapratijñena mātṛgrāmasya nṛttagītasyâbharaṇānāṃ vā śabdaṃ śrutvâyoniśena manaskāreṇâkṣiptabuddhinā tac chrutvā hasitalaḍitakrīḍitāny aśucim
SA11sanss04u:591: tatra te nārakâyovarṣeṇa sarvâṅgapratyaṅgaśaś cūrṇyante 'ṅgāravarṣeṇa ca pacyante dahyantae ity ādi /
SA11sanss04u:595: te droṇiṣv ayomayair muṣalair hanyantae iti vistaraḥ //
SA11sanss04u:596: evam apsarasaḥ prārthanayā brahmacaryapariṇāmanān mahāpadumo nāma narakôktaḥ /
SA11sanss04u:598: tasyāṃ nadyāṃ yāny asthīni te pāṣāṇāḥ /
SA11sanss04u:605: evaṃ puruṣasya puruṣeṇa saha maithunavipratipatteḥ aprameyâkāraṇā viśeṣāḥ paṭhyante /
SA11sanss04u:606: evaṃ śiśubhiḥ saha vipratipatteḥ kṣāranadyām uhyamānān dārakān
SA11sanss04u:613: tāsām eva govaḍavâdīnāṃ taptâyomayīnāṃ akuśalanirmitānāṃ yonimārgeṇa sa tiryakkāmasevī praviśati /
SA11sanss04u:618: evam anyanāśitāsv api bhikṣuṇīṣu vipratipannānāṃ mahānarakapātanāḥ paṭhyante /
SA11sanss04u:620: evaṃ prasahyânītāsv api parastrīṣu labdhāsu ca kanyāsu /
SA11sanss04u:622: jñātiśabdamānitāsu ca vipratipatteḥ tīvrāś câparimāṇāś ca mahānarakapātanāḥ paṭhyante //

SA11sanss04u:627: sa tadā svādayati adhyavasyati adhyavasāya tiṣṭhati /

SA11sanss04u:640: yataś câite kāmâivaṃ smaraṇaprārthanāviṣayam api gatâivam

SA11sanss04u:668: yāvan maṇḍūkānāṃ satāṃ sarpāṇāṃ mukhe parivartitasyânto na prajñāyate /

SA11sanss04u:675: duṣkhaṃ tīvraṃ kharaṃ kaṭukam anubhūtaṃ rudhiraṃ prasyanditaṃ pragharitaṃ yac caturṣu mahāsamudreṣûdakāt
SA11sanss04u:683: tad yathā cakṣūrogaḥ śrotrarogo yāvad arśāṃsi piṭako bhagandaraḥ //
SA11sanss04u:691: yāvan nârhasy evam udgharantaṃ pragharantaṃ jugupsanīyaṃ kāyaṃ pratiṣevituṃ //
SA11sanss04u:699: tvaṃ ca kāmān pratisevya vinipātagato bhaviṣyasi /
SA11sanss04u:705: tena kāmamithyâcārāt prativiratena bhavitavyaṃ svadārasaṃtuṣṭena paradārânabhilāṣiṇâraktanetraprekṣiṇā nirviṇṇamanasā /
SA11sanss04u:715: tathâhaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā saṃkalpair api kāmān na paribhokṣye /
SA11sanss04u:716: kaḥ punar vādo dvîndriyasamāpattyā vânaṅgavijñaptyā vêti //
SA11sanss04u:731: mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ vihāyasântarīkṣe
SA11sanss04u:732: tālamātram abhyudgamya sthitvā ca taṃ mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ gāthābhir adhyabhāṣata //
SA11sanss04u:733: kāyaṃ mamêkṣadhvam imaṃ manojñaṃ suvarṇavarṇaṃ jvalanaprakāśam /
SA11sanss04u:734: na raktacittasya hi mānuṣasya prajñāyate śobhanakaṃ śarīram //
SA11sanss04u:735: ye etv agnikarṣûpamasaṃpradīptān tyajanti kāmān viṣayeṣv agṛddhāḥ /
SA11sanss04u:736: ṣaḍindriyaiḥ saṃvarasaṃvṛtāś ca ye brahmacaryaṃ ca caranti śubham //
SA11sanss04u:737: dṛṣṭvā ca dārān hi parasya ye vai kurvanti mātābhaginîti
SA11sanss04u:739: prāsādikās te hi sudarśanīyā bhavanti nityaṃ paramaṃ manojñāḥ //
SA11sanss04u:740: sphuṭām imāṃ vettha purīṃ samantād yo romakūpān mama câtigandhaḥ /
SA11sanss04u:744: na me samutpadyati rāgacittaṃ mā vītarāgāsu janīṣva rāgaṃ /
SA11sanss04u:745: sākṣī mamâyaṃ purato munîndraḥ satyaṃ yathā vedmi na jātu
SA11sanss04u:749: bhrātā svasā câpi pitā babhūva ko rāgacittaṃ janayej jananyāṃ //
SA11sanss04u:756: na nirvṛtiṃ yānti ca raktacittā rāgo hi tasmāt parivarjanīyaḥ //
SA11sanss04u:762: kāṇāś ca khañjāś ca vijihvakāś ca /
SA11sanss04u:764: bhavanti nānāvidhadoṣabhājāś caranti ye kāmacarīṃ jaghanyām //
SA11sanss04u:767: brahmāṇêśā [[DOUBT]] vaśavarttinaś ca tad brahmacaryaṃ vipulaṃ caritvā //
SA11sanss04u:772: kṣitîśvarāś câiva bhavanty udagrāḥ suśreṣṭhino vai
SA11sanss04u:774: sukhasaumanasyena ca yānti vṛddhiṃ ye brahmacaryaṃ vipulaṃ caranti //
SA11sanss04u:790: mārasya gocaro hy eṣa prasthitā yena durgatiḥ /
SA11sanss04u:792: kīṭakumbho yathā citro yatra yatrâiva dṛśyate /
SA11sanss04u:795: daurgandhyaṃ sravate kāyād bālānāṃ tad yathā madhu //
SA11sanss04u:797: gaṇḍabhūto hy ayaṃ kāyaḥ kutsito hy āmagandhikaḥ //
SA11sanss04u:799: evam eva hy ayaṃ kāyo viṣṭhâdyaśucibhājanam //
SA11sanss04u:806: bālā nimittaṃ gṛhṇanti vacane darśane 'pi ca //
SA11sanss04u:807: uktāḥ paścān na jānanti yo deśaḥ sarvakutsitaḥ /
SA11sanss04u:810: kakṣāsv āgharate svedo gandho vāyati kutsitaḥ //
SA11sanss04u:811: kurvanti duṣkṛtaṃ karma yena gacchanti durgatim /

SA11sanss04u:815: tasmād dhīnasya hīnābhiḥ strībhir bhavati saṅgatiḥ /
SA11sanss04u:817: yādṛśaṃ kurute karma tādṛśaṃ labhate phalam //
SA11sanss04u:822: upasaṃhṛtair na prabhavanti śramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyo dānaṃ dātuṃ kṛpaṇavanīpakayācakebhyo 'vaśīkṛtāḥ strībhiḥ
SA11sanss04u:824: tenâiva strīpremṇā tasyâiva poṣaṇāya na śaknuvanti dānaṃ dātuṃ śīlaṃ ca samādātuṃ /
SA11sanss04u:825: sa tatra raktaḥ samānaḥ strīparibhāṣitāni sahate
SA11sanss04u:827: sa mātṛgrāmeṇa tarjitaḥ puruṣaḥ saṃsīdati viṣīdati sukhaṃ câsyâvalokayati /
SA11sanss04u:829: ayaṃ mahārāja kāmalolupasya puruṣasyôccārasukhaparamasyâśucau ratasyâsaṃprajanyâcāriṇo doṣaḥ //

SA11sanss04u:836: strīgataṃ câsya tac cittaṃ viḍālasyêva mūṣike //

SA11sanss04u:982: madhyâhnasamaye tathâiva sāyâhnasamaye dānaṃ dadyād anena
SA11sanss04u:984: tat kiṃ manyase kulaputrâpi nu sa puruṣo bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet //
SA11sanss04u:986: bahu bhadanta bhagavan sa puruṣaḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaved aprameyam
SA11sanss04u:988: na tasya puṇyaskandhasya kenacic chakyaṃ pramāṇam udgrahītuṃ anyatra tathāgatena //
SA11sanss04u:990: yas tu kulaputra kṣatriyakalyāṇo vā yāvad yathā pūrvôktaṃ / pe /
SA11sanss04u:993: yāvad vipulataram apramāṇataram asaṃkhyeyataraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati /
SA11sanss04u:994: yo mama paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ vartamānāyāṃ saddharmanetrī rakṣati sa rakṣaty ātmānaṃ /
SA11sanss04u:995: rakṣati parāṃś ca rakṣati paralokaṃ rakṣati mama śāsanaṃ śrāvakān pātrabhūtān apātrabhūtān vā yāva-
SA11sanss04u:1000: yāvat svakaṃ rāṣṭraṃ pararāṣṭraṃ ca vardhayati /
SA11sanss04u:1002: surâlayaṃ ca prāpayati ciraṃ câyuḥ pālayati /
SA11sanss04u:1009: nityaṃ kalyāṇamitrair buddhaiś ca bhagavadbhir bodhisatvaiś ca
SA11sanss04u:1016: ye te bhadanta bhagavan etarhy anāgate 'dhvani yāvat paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ kṣatriyakalyāṇā bhavanti yāvad gahapatikalyāṇāḥ / pe /
SA11sanss04u:1020: vayam api sarve saparivārās taṃ kṣatriyakalyāṇaṃ yāvad gahapatikalyāṇaṃ daśabhir ākārai rakṣiṣyāmaḥ
SA11sanss04u:1023: āyuś câsya vardhayiṣyāmaḥ āyurantarāyaṃ ca dharmeṇa
SA11sanss04u:1025: ārogyaṃ ca parivāraṃ ca dhanaskandhaṃ côpabhogaparibhogaṃ câiśvaryaṃ ca yaśaḥ kalyāṇamitrāṇi prajñāsampadaṃ ca
SA11sanss04u:1034: yas tv eṣāṃ buddhaputrāṇāṃ naraḥ kurvītâpriyaṃ /
SA11sanss04u:1035: devān manuṣyān varjitvā narakaṃ tasya gocaraṃ //
SA11sanss04u:1037: na câtra viśeṣahetuḥ kaścid upadarśayituṃ śakyatae ity alaṃ vikalpena //
SA11sanss04u:1041: āvaraṇaṃ mañjuśrīr ucyate rāgâvaraṇaṃ dveṣâvaraṇaṃ mohâvaraṇaṃ dānam āvaraṇaṃ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñâvaraṇaṃ / pe /
SA11sanss04u:1043: tat kasya hetoḥ bālapṛthagjanā mañjuśrīr dānaṃ dadānā matsariṇām antike 'prasādaṃ kurvanti /
SA11sanss04u:1048: te teṣāṃ doṣaṃ śrutvā bahujanasyâprasādaṃ kurvanti /
SA11sanss04u:1055: te vīryam ārabhamāṇâtmānam utkarṣayanti parān paṃsayanti /
SA11sanss04u:1056: kusīdême bhikṣavo viharanty anabhiyuktāḥ śraddhādeyaṃ paribhuñjānāḥ /
SA11sanss04u:1058: te tena vīryârambheṇâtmānam utkarṣayanti paraṃ ca paṃsayanti /
SA11sanss04u:1060: te dhyānaṃ samāpadyamānās tatra dhyānasamāpattau spṛhām
SA11sanss04u:1075: saced bodhisatvasyântike hīnasaṃjñām utpādayati ātmani côdārasaṃjñāṃ kṣiṇoty ātmānaṃ-
SA11sanss04u:1082: na devaputra bodhisatvaḥ kvacid eva kuśalamūlāni samucchinatti /
SA11sanss04u:1089: iha dṛḍhamate sa pudgalaḥ pāñcagatike saṃsāre upapanno bhavati /
SA11sanss04u:1090: yadi vā nirayeṣu yadi vā tiryagyonau yadi vā yamaloke yadi vā deveṣu
SA11sanss04u:1102: atha khalv āyuṣmān mahākāśyapo bhagavantam etad avocat /
SA11sanss04u:1106: na hy asmākam etaj jñānaṃ pravarttate /
SA11sanss04u:1109: tato vayaṃ bhagavann ajānānās tathārūpeṣu hīnasaṃjñām
SA11sanss04u:1115: sādhu sādhu kāśyapa subhāṣitā te iyaṃ vāk /
SA11sanss04u:1121: yac chīghraṃ kṣaṇyati hi bhikṣavaḥ pudgalaḥ pudgalaṃ pravicinvan /
SA11sanss04u:1122: ahaṃ vā pudgalaṃ pramiṇuyāṃ yo vā syān mādṛśaḥ /
SA11sanss04u:1123: etena kāśyapa nirdeśena bodhisatvena vā śrāvakeṇa vā
SA11sanss04u:1125: mâtra kaścid bodhisatvayānikaḥ pudgalo bhavet tena tatrâtmā rakṣitavyêti /
SA11sanss04u:1126: yasya tu niyatam eva bodhiprāpticihnam asti tatra sutarām avamanyanā
SA11sanss04u:1129: iṣṭāmayān mṛttikasaṃcitān vā prītāś ca kurvanti jinasya
SA11sanss04u:1131: uddiśya vā pāṃśukarâśayo 'pi aṭavīṣu durgeṣu ca
SA11sanss04u:1133: siktāmayā vā puna kūṭa kṛtvā ye kecid uddiśya jināna stūpān /
SA11sanss04u:1146: sarve ca te bodhi abhūṣi lābhinaḥ //
SA11sanss04u:1150: sugatānam uddiśyatha pūjanârthaṃ gītaṃ ca gītaṃ madhuraṃ manojñaṃ /
SA11sanss04u:1174: tad yathā vāḍiśikena mahaty udakasarasi matsyâkarṣaṇârthaṃ sâmiṣaṃ vaḍiśaṃ prakṣiptaṃ bhavet samanantaraprakṣiptaṃ ca
SA11sanss04u:1176: kiṃ câpi sa matsyôdakasarasi bhramaty atha ca punar vaddhâiva
SA11sanss04u:1178: yat sa vāḍiśikâgatya tena sūtralāghavena jānāti /
SA11sanss04u:1180: tam enaṃ sūtrād gṛhītvā sthalagataṃ ka-
SA11sanss04u:1184: evam eva ye satvā buddheṣu bhagavatsu cittaṃ prasādya kuśalamūlam
SA11sanss04u:1187: kiṃ câpi te satvā duṣkṛtena karmâvaraṇenâkṣaṇeṣûpapannā bhavanty atha ca buddhā bhagavantas tān satvān bauddhena
SA11sanss04u:1188: jñānena saṃgrahavastusūtreṇa gṛhītvā saṃsārôdakasarasôddhṛtya nirvāṇasthale sthāpayantîti //
SA11sanss04u:1192: yathā meghena dramiḍena mahābodhisatvenâpi satā navakâryasudhanaḥ sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya vanditaḥ /
SA11sanss04u:1202: kiṃ ca buddhānām apy evam iṣyate /
SA11sanss04u:1207: yo hi kaścin mañjuśrīs tathāgatabhāṣitadharme kasmiṃścic chobhanasaṃjñāṃ karoti /
SA11sanss04u:1212: yâivaṃ vadatîdaṃ yuktam idam ayuktam iti sa saddharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
SA11sanss04u:1213: na mayā pṛthak kaścid dharmaḥ śrāvakayānasaṃprayuktaḥ
SA11sanss04u:1215: tat te mohapuruṣêmaṃ mama dharmaṃ nānākariṣyanti /
SA11sanss04u:1216: idaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ deśitam idaṃ pratyekabuddhānām idaṃ bodhisatvānām iti /
SA11sanss04u:1225: apagate buddhôtpāde nâsti dhāraṇīpratilambhêti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
SA11sanss04u:1235: āloko 'sya dharmāṇāṃ na suviditêti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
SA11sanss04u:1236: mantreṇa mantram abudhyamānaḥ prativadatîti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
SA11sanss04u:1240: akṣarasaṃjñayā kañcid adhimuktaṃ karoti kañcin na karotîti
SA11sanss04u:1245: ihâsyâsti caryêhâsya nâsti caryêti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
SA11sanss04u:1246: idaṃ sûktam idam asûktam iti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
SA11sanss04u:1249: dharmaṃ pratikṣipatîti hi mañjuśrīr yāvat kiñcid vilopayati
SA11sanss04u:1251: dharmabhāṇakasyêdaṃ rūpam iti cintayati vadati bhikṣur vā
SA11sanss04u:1255: yasya kasyacit kulaputra tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya dharmaḥ pratibhāti
SA11sanss04u:1257: tasyāṃ ca parṣadi yady ekasatvasyâpi ekaromaharṣo bhaved ekâśrupāto vā sarvaḥ sa tathāgatânubhāvena /
SA11sanss04u:1258: tatra mohapuruṣâbodhisatvā bodhisatvapratijñā bodhisatvadūṣakā dharmastainyakuhakâivaṃ vakṣyanti
SA11sanss04u:1269: yo bodhisatvo dharmabhāṇakam apavādati buddhaṃ sa vigarhati
SA11sanss04u:1270: dharmaṃ sa pratikṣipati saṃghaṃ sa jugupsati /
SA11sanss04u:1272: buddhaṃ sa na draṣṭukāmo yo dharmabhāṇakam adraṣṭukāmaḥ /
SA11sanss04u:1273: buddhasya so 'varṇaṃ bhāṣate yo dharmabhāṇakasyâvarṇaṃ bhāṣate /
SA11sanss04u:1274: buddhas tena parityakto bhavati yaḥ prathamacittôtpādike 'pi
SA11sanss04u:1277: yo 'py ayaṃ maitreya ṣaṭpāramitāsamudāgamo bodhisatvānāṃ saṃbodhāya taṃ te mohapuruṣâivaṃ vakṣyanti /
SA11sanss04u:1281: tat kiṃ manyase 'jita duṣprajñaḥ sa kāśirājâbhūd yena
SA11sanss04u:1286: yāni mayā maitreya bodhisatvacaryāṃ caratā ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlāny upacitāni apakṛtaṃ nu taiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ //
SA11sanss04u:1290: tvaṃ tāvad ajita ṣaṣṭiṃ kalpān dānapāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ kalpān śīlapāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ kalpān
SA11sanss04u:1291: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ kalpān vīryapāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ kalpān dhyānapāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ kalpān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samudāgataḥ /
